text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump This is exactly why I say, there are no excuses this time around, for not doing legitimate fact finding research! Don’t take what Trump & his forever lying incompetent & corrupt Administration says! Read what Pence is telling GOP Senators to do! https://t.co/8pVAvsmQtO
